entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is not normal according to his uncle.

entities.name: dursley
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is angry and threatening towards Harry.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon, who is treating Harry like a bomb that might go off at any moment.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is being protected by his aunt and uncle.

relationships.description: Uncle Dursley is angry with Harry for saying the M word in their house.
Uncle Vernon threatens Harry, telling him that he will not tolerate mention of his abnormality under their roof.
Uncle Vernon is protecting Dudley from Harry's supposed threat.
